website_summaries.verdict: If you don't want to spend more than double or triple the cost on the Bose SoundLink On-Ear Bluetooth or  Beats' wireless headphones, the Hesh 2 Wireless is a decent budget Bluetooth headphone choice.
pros: The Skullcandy Hesh 2 Wireless sounds reasonably good for a $100 USD Bluetooth headphone, has decent battery life (15 hours), and is fairly comfortable to wear
Its integrated three-button remote works well and is easy to operate by feel
cons: Sound quality is good, but not great

website_summaries.verdict: The Skullcandy Hesh 2 wireless headphones deliver a solid Bluetooth audio experience and the ability to listen in passive, wired mode.
pros: Strong, distortion-free audio with robust bass
Includes cable for passive, wired listening
cons: Sound can seem overly sculpted, and not as crisp as it should be
Can get uncomfortable during long listening periods

customer_reviews.title: Asides that every other thing including the battery life is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely product but I am a bass person which the hesh 2.0 has zero bass! Asides that every other thing including the battery life is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Ettah I.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend who wears them 24/7 so needed really good battery life - and they delivered! The ear cups are made of a super comfy material and I am told the sound quality is excellent, Bluetooth lasts all day and more without needing to be charged very often and the detachable cable is perfect for when he needs to connect to his Xbox. Only issue is they don't fit around his neck for easy carrying, but they don't very often leave his ears anyway! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Flaherty

customer_reviews.title: SkullCandy Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive hearing and my hubby has poor hearing. Some days the TV is so loud I am very uncomfortable. He has had other bluetooth headphones but nothing that compares with these. He is very happy and now so am I. They are noise cancelling as he does not hear me if I call out to him. We would not be using the headphones for gaming so I cannot comment on them for that purpose. Sound quality is excellent I am very pleased I got these .
customer_reviews.author: Extraordinary Housewife

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not what I expected. I had the Skullcandy grind before this, which were cheaper and in my opinion were better. The bass is poor on these and so is sound quality and clarity... The pair I have also refuse to play songs out of both sides of the headphones at the same time. It takes a lot of fiddling with the volume and wire to get them to play equally on both sides which is irritating. I know you get what you pay fr but I'm disappointed because I had a cheaper model of Skullcandy headphones which were way better than these.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Terrific quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful rich, clear sound, a comfortable fit, great quality and wireless to boot! I am extremely happy with my purchase of these headphones. I'd previously tried other Bluetooth headphones but these are miles better... and you even get a bag/pouch to keep them in when not in use. I've bought several different pairs of Skullcandy headphones before, ranging from earbuds to full-size cans, and all of them have been reliably good quality. highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ashwell

customer_reviews.title: Look ok, sound great, but broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace an old devil monkey pair of same brand, which I love and have used since they were released. These were new, sealed in a plastic container; you have to cut them out. The real deal, and I was stoked to have found them and whilst a different style, the sound quality was similar to my old ones. Sadly these broke after first use. The plastic around the 3 screws on each side is too brittle, I guess due to how old they are, even though new? Sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant,  good price,  highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Sound reproduction in these headphones is brilliant, battery life is very good, i use mine all the time and was surprised at the length of charger, recharge to 100% is very quick, connection to bluetooth is first class, and the distance from source is brilliant, you can connect by cable is you wish, i bought some for xmas presents for family and they are well chuffed too
customer_reviews.author: the hood

customer_reviews.title: Returned it with heavy heart...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it but returned it because : 1. The headphone cannot be folded or lay flat on a surface. This earphone cannot be hanged around your neck as it clutches and suffocating and with these on the neck you really cannot put your chin down. I really wanted to keep it. 2. Long use of these headphones cause a little pain and sweat on the top side of ear loves. It looks a heavy n thick. But I can still live with it provided the number 1 was corrected. I returned it with heavy heart. The sound was good and noise cancellation etc. I was not expecting much from it.
customer_reviews.author: Trailokya

customer_reviews.title: Decent wireless over headphones
customer_reviews.text: Decent enough sound. Really good battery performance and a cord for when it runs out. If you are not used to wearing over ears, the pressure will be noticeable after a few hours. They are quite large though, I only use them in my home, so not fussed how they look. Connected fine to my phone and Echo Dot
customer_reviews.author: P K

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, my 15 year old son loves them! Not active noise cancelling but blocks outside noise to a point. No noticeable sound leakage when in use and very comfortable to use. Battery lasts a long time. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: MR D BAKER

customer_reviews.title: Good noise cancelling and great sound
customer_reviews.text: These were my first wireless head phones, they are super easy to pair with my phone (android) i haven't had any issues with the battery, i normally charge after 2-3 uses, but i don't user them for more than 3 hours really, so i haven't figured out how long they get out of one charge. They have really good noise cancelling, my partner is always giving me a fright when i have them on!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky cowie

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Recommend Enough. reviewing 2&1/2 years later.
customer_reviews.text: Would categorize these as one of my best purchases. was using them the other day and felt i had to come back and review. purchased April 2017. cannot fault them. sound quality is excellent. very comfortable to wear. often wear them whilst working to help concentrate so multiple hours at a time. build quality is excellent, shown very little wear and tear after 2 1/2 years of consistent use. battery life is insanely good. if i have to find a negative it would be that the mic is a little quiet when using the phone for other people to hear you but i dont tend to use them for phone. as above. Cannot recommend enough
customer_reviews.author: T. Mulcahy

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money and comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: These are the fourth pair of over-ear headphones I've tried. I'm very happy with the fit. They don't hurt my ears nor overheat my head, problems I've had with beats headphones. Neither are they too large and loose. The sound is great. In comparison to the very tight fitting beats headphone the sound isn't quite as powerful but it is what makes the Skullcandy wearable.Very happy and very good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Delivered Broken Again
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product as a Christmas present Opened on Christmas Day and only one of the two headphones worked Returned it and ordered the same model to replace it It arrived today Guess What ?! Only one headphone works Twice I’ve had a disappointed child through delivery of faulty goods
customer_reviews.author: Scott C

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good product bought as directed by and for my Grandson he says they are great and he will never forget this gift and he will forever Be grateful he loves them..so I’m well in...till next Christmas Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Fm Oshea

customer_reviews.title: Long battery, little too quiet few gripes wont buy again but also wont be looking to trade-in either
customer_reviews.text: Poor mid to low, not as loud as my old beat studio (skull candy usually tend to be nice and loud with good base) great Bluetooth connectivity better than my beats. Incredibly battery they came with a bit of charge decided to use till that had gone 3 weeks later still going strong really impressed with the battery. Biggest issues for me they can’t be folded so carrying them in my gym bag is an issue and no track skip which is a pain during cardio. (Reviewed after 4 weeks daily use)
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. They are very comfortable to wear. They have excellent sound quality. They are not noise cancelling headphones but they certainly do muffle any external noise. They are very easy to connect and they really do hold their charge extremely well. I have mainly used them to listen to music or for telephone calls, the other caller can hear me quite clearly and vice versa, they have a very good range so you don't need to carry your phone or device around that they are connected upto. I can definitely recommend these and would not hesitate to buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Warburton

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headphones for under £50 that I have ever owned. I have purchased three pairs now, some for myself, and my two sons. They are both really pleased with theirs as well. I often go walking and enjoy listening to an audio book when I do so, these headphones cancel out almost all of the road noise. When playing music, the sound is clear, not tinny and not too heavy on the base. They are very comfortable on the ears and the padding on the headband is a really nice feature. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brian lodge

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones, great sound quality and range with Bluetooth, very comfortable and completely envelope ears. Just make sure to have an inbuilt Bluetooth adapter, I've had nothing but trouble with the usb ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended - bought twice
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same headphones about an year ago but in black. There were issues with the wire but i never complained because I always used bluetooth. I bought these because I left my other headphones somewhere during a vacation. These headphones are very comformtable. The sound is completely noise cancelling and on full volume it seems like you are actually listening to the music live. I would recommend these headphones, though they might look expensive but are much better then beats.
customer_reviews.author: A.N

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality on these headphones is fantastic, it has such a long battery life (I charged mine about a month ago and it's on 70%) and have some cool little features, like the power button flashes slightly so you know it's on.
customer_reviews.author: imogen lay

customer_reviews.title: Skullcandy delivers yet again
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headphones. Love the sound, bass is medium to low and the disconnecting cable is great. This headset also allows me to use and answer my phone with its inline controls for anyone wanting to purchase this for an Android device. Havent tested on Apple device and i know they can be picky so im stating Android for that reason. Use as my daily commute to and from work and for watching stuff on my tablet. Overall a great piece of kit for the money. Build quality is very good and sturdy and can easily survive some shock treatment
customer_reviews.author: Chaosprime

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Brillaint purchase, bought these for my partner for Christmas. He was very happy with them, perfect size and has excellent noice cancellation. Battery life is good and connects easy to bluetooth for phones.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah pickles

customer_reviews.title: Stick a audio book on walk 45 minutes to work laughing your head off
customer_reviews.text: Why does it ask about battery life you don't charge these. These have been gold ok nerly been run over with these on but don't drive like a bat out of hell. These are nice and comfy got as a birthday present about a year or so ago when these break will be looking to buy a second time
customer_reviews.author: Mr. George Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Feels good, fits well
customer_reviews.text: Feels good, fits well, ears feel comfortable, great extendable headband, great flexibility for larger heads, sound quality is very good for the price, comes with a carry bag which is great and it comes with an aux cable if battery for the bluetooth runs out. battery life is not the best, the ear cups look quite big and not slim
customer_reviews.author: J.Singh

customer_reviews.title: Skull candy
customer_reviews.text: Only been using for a few hours but they connected to my Samsung tab 2 in seconds. Listened to a few songs on youtube and have found the sound to be impressive.,nice bass but not to deep.comfortable to wear cupping your ears nicely and big vume buttons to blindly reach for. Over all I'm would not hesitate in recommending them.
customer_reviews.author: Demon Knight

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my hubby and he loves them. He said the sound quality is great and they are very comfortable! For the price I paid these seem to be a very good alternative to more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my wife. She is very pleased with them and I have enough brownie points to see me through until Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Wilcock

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic battery life, ok sound quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price these headphones are great. The sound quality is generally good, but I bought them originally to use with an electric piano and somehow they make it sound awful in comparison to other headphones. The battery life is amazing. I received the headphones about 4 weeks ago, I've used them for about 30 minutes a day and according to my phone they still have 70% battery (I'm yet to charge them, a month after purchase!). Very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 3 years or so
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for the past 4 years and they were working fine up till a few months ago when the connection kept cutting out and there are bits of the material around the headphones flaking off Otherwise worked for a few years without issues, although I can’t wear them for more than an hour or two
customer_reviews.author: Rachelkal66

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Really good sound, good build quality and gne battery seems to last forever it’s never does on me. Only slight negative is for over ear hadphones the cups are small I don’t have big ears but they aren’t as comfy as some of my other
customer_reviews.author: Whistlingdixy

customer_reviews.title: Too much sound leak
customer_reviews.text: Too much sound leak and pretty uncomfortable over the head. The sound leak was much evident and was audible at a fair distance of almost 3-4 mt s in full volume. You cant imagine yourself listening to full volume while in Tube as it would just irritate the person next to you. very uncomfortable over the head as well. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Ashish Mathur

customer_reviews.title: Battery could be better
customer_reviews.text: Battery life could be better, mine is good for around 4-5 hours with a charge. Don’t forget to turn it off
customer_reviews.author: KazuUK

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price point
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones and comfortable to wear for extended periods. Not what I would call 'hi-fi' quality but good for listening to rock, pop and dance. Bass is pretty weighty and the external noise cancellation is quite reasonable too.
customer_reviews.author: M HM

customer_reviews.title: Great product if you get what you order
customer_reviews.text: Very good headphones, would have given them a 5, however mine were incorrectly supplied by JIMSONS as the version without the inline mic, and despite messaging them twice they have never responded, let alone offered any explanation/ return. Headphones: Very Good; Inline Mic: Don't know JIMSONS: Wouldn't Trust Them As Far As I Could Throw Them
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Really bad audio leakage,
customer_reviews.text: These seem really bassy, too bassy when you're wearing them. I let someone else wear them so I could listen if they bleed audio much... and they do. It's really bad, if you wore these on the bus or something people would be punching you in the face in their mind because they hate your music and they now hate you.
customer_reviews.author: MRG

customer_reviews.title: brilliant
customer_reviews.text: These head phone are very good. I have been a fan of skull candy since they entered the uk market some time ago. The only isssue I have ever had with any pair of skull candys is that the wire connecting to the jack breaks easily long before the actual head phones so I was very pleased with the removable wire. The only reason I gave 4 stars and not 5 is that The bass range was not as high as I was expecting but still very goodz for the money. Best think about these though is the colour. They match my pc really well. If only skull candy would make custom colour headphones like these !
customer_reviews.author: C-Modder

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase
customer_reviews.text: We bought these again as the first set lasted so well, dropped many times by my son but took years to eventually break. Good battery life and sound quality, also very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: karrie lee

customer_reviews.title: Teanager loves in these. Looses a star fof flashing light
customer_reviews.text: Teenager heaven - he now does not have to listen to me. Has a bright blue flashing light you cant turn off. Light is only small, but might bug you if, for example you use to watch films in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: FatMat

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!! Really good value for money!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. They arrived earlier than expected. They have one of the most cheapest and reliable prices around so for £45 (what I got it for at the time) they’re a very good set of headphones. Everything that it says on the box is correct, they come pre charged to full which is also a plus! I love them. Amazing for bass, and surprisingly cut out surrounding sounds very well.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of skullcandy for multiple years now and they've never let me down, I but the bullet and bought these. I'm very impressed, the sound quality is amazing and blocks out all the noise around me. As someone who's autistic and is sensitive to loud sudden noises, these work like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Value for money but..
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money wireless over ear headphones. Great bass but not so loud as some people would like them to be. The only real negative I found was that the cushions tend to get really hot when you wear them for extensive amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Neo

customer_reviews.title: Serve their purpose
customer_reviews.text: This item, although rather garish in appearance, do the job very well. I top rate it because the sound production is superb for the price. I use the product with my HTC Desire S through the Amazon music player. I bought my first walkman in 1981, the sound produced by htc and skullcandy is much, much better.To me it is simply miraculous that kit like this exists. I have used other phones with the HTC, these skull candies are the best I've had. I am 59 and getting used to the funny looks which the earthlings give me when wearing these phones. A younger person should get away with it, though. A bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Bronstein

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Lovely Head Phones... Sound Quality Brilliant 15 hours Bat no problem! Paired up and ready to Rock!
customer_reviews.author: Lee-ann E.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought them years ago.
customer_reviews.text: I previously had the Skullcandy Uproar headphones. Which were pretty good. But decided to upgrade to the Skullcandy Hesh 2 headphones. The quality and features on the Hesh 2 is outstanding. Connectivity is good. Battery life is excellent. Build quality is high. Design is robust.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Foster

customer_reviews.title: A happy teenager!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son. He seems very happy with them. Says they are comfy good sound, not quite noise cancelling, can hear a little noise but not enough to worry him.
customer_reviews.author: Scorch

customer_reviews.title: Bad fit, good battery
customer_reviews.text: Got this in a rush after my Hesh 3 broke. Not a particularly comfortable fit, and noise leak is very bad. Sound quality and battery life are good though.
customer_reviews.author: Ozias

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cans for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought two pairs of these for my teenage sons. I'm spoilt with my Bose QuietComfort 35s, yet still found these to have decent meaty sound and solid build quality. £10 discount on Prime made them amazing value. Excellent headphones for the money, easy set up great battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. N. Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Having done my research on several headphones to buy as a gift, I bought these for my boyfriend. He absolutely loves them and I've used them a couple of times. They are extremely comfortable, the sound quality is great, battery last a long time, and they are super durable. I think we've had them for 2 years and they are almost brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the quality of the product, easy to connect and the controls are simple, robust and large - very easy to feel + and - by fingertouch. Sound is excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Charlton

customer_reviews.title: Fat Rasta phones are the biz
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's 18th birthday and to replace his previous Skullcandy reggae/rasta (slimmer) headphones. Advertised as £60 RRP phones for £20...so I bought them. These are fatter phones but quality just as good, so he says. Make sure you push the connecting leads fully in. We thought there was a defect with the phones as initially sound was clear but volume was very low and then realised the lead was only partially in. Nearly returned it as a defective item !
customer_reviews.author: Dazza6061

customer_reviews.title: Good headset
customer_reviews.text: Lasts a long time overall a good product even though I've used these in work environment it's does a good job as for headphones and ear protectors the only thing i do not like about them is it makes my ears sore if I wear them too long overall though a good product.
customer_reviews.author: rhys delaney

customer_reviews.title: Stunning as always with Skullcandy but not as big a sound as you would hope!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits snuggly over ear and feels very comfortable. A Little lacking in top and bottom end. Felt like i was literally pulling the headphones apart when adjusting. For an every day wearer its passable.... but compared to some of the competition its looks far out weight its performance!! Update, headphones are broken, left ear has stopped working, not good
customer_reviews.author: James Bradbury-Hulls

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant audio for a discount. Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Skullcandy make headsets with very high quality playback. This one is no exception and is of the quality I'd expect from Skullcandy. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Roisin

customer_reviews.title: Really good, not disapointed.
customer_reviews.text: These fit really well, the sounds clear and I’m really happy with the packaging they came in. Easy to connect via Bluetooth and comes with a wire in the event the battery dies which is really helpful
customer_reviews.author: Dramaqueen

customer_reviews.title: All good
customer_reviews.text: Bought for son for Xbox gaming. Good looking headphones, he says they are comfortable and the sound quality is great. The mic is built in and they are a great battery life, he's pleased so must be good.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Product
customer_reviews.text: Looking at other reviews people appear to be having no problems with this headset, so I'll assume what has happened to me is one of those rare circumstances. Sadly the headset doesn't work at all and plays no music, the plugin for the audio jack also appears to have been scratched open? So I can only assume this headset was bought and then returned only to be sold again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Had these headphones for a very long time and used them without ever having a single issue with them. The detachable cable made them easy to pack for travel if needed. They looked great and fitted confortablly with height adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Aled Duckfield

customer_reviews.title: Great for the gym
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is amazing, nice clear sound with good bass. The battery lasts for days, used each day for 2hrs in the gym; only charge once a week. The matt finish does allow for marks to appear and finger prints are visible, but can be wiped clean showing no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kraig Evans

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Dont work , was a Christmas present for my daughter phoned Amazon they told me to email the company done that have not heard a thing DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.author: julie dennis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: They are the best headphones I have ever had. Awesome sound quality, comfortable and great battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Rae73

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 11 year old and he absolutely loves them! Would highly recommend this product, very easy to set up too!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had a more expensive pair of skullcandy in the past and these rate quite close to those ones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son loves them
customer_reviews.text: All good and my son loves them. Good range on wireless and sounds good. Not convinced about the mike though, feels a bit flimsy on the swirch but working fine at th emoment.
customer_reviews.author: Rippa700

customer_reviews.title: Most durable headphones I’ve owned by miles
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Hesh 2.0 headphones over 7 years ago (March 2013). Aside from the soft ear pads which have become detached (not fussed), they’re rock solid and they still sound brilliant - no noticeable loss of sound quality. If ever the sound cuts out I know it’s time to switch cables. That they’ve served me this well for so long is worth 5 stars in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant! I got these last night
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant! I got these last night, had a quick listen and the sound quality is great. They're also a comfortable wear which is nice. However, when I put them on to wear for my commute this morning I discovered out cat had already eaten through the wire. One quick trip to Smiths on the way in however and I had bought a replacement lead for just a fiver and had my entertainment back. The detachable lead is a fantastic idea! Well done Skullcandy. I am having deliberations now though whether to turn the cat in a rug or a hat.
customer_reviews.author: Miss K J Ryall

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: A very happy son! Great set of headphones with a mic. Comfortable etc. Fast efficient service would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are awesome a lot cheaper than anywhere else that i can find however there is no difference with the sound quality durability and or comfort, the only problem you may find is they aren't the most stylish headphones, and if that's what you're going for on ear are a little better rather than these over ear headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Ize

customer_reviews.title: Fits on my oh big head
customer_reviews.text: Funky design. Snug fit. Even fits on my oh big head haha. You need to make sure you push the cable in the headphones with some effort or you get a disorientated sound. We thought they were faulty at first because of this but then i figured the cable needed pushing in further in to the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: AdelicateGem

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Great quality earphones. Wireless battery lasts a good week with moderate to high use. Call quality is excellent. Sound is great although not noise cancelling still does the job. The buttons and instructions for use is straight forward. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tiger Single

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. The feel great, they look luxurious, have a great sound quality and are very comfortable. Can be used wirelessly or plugged in. on the higher side for Skullcandy, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Missed 5 stars for 1 thing
customer_reviews.text: The microphone on this device is trash, but everything else is top tier.
customer_reviews.author: NetworkTech4000

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: A gift for our sons birthday , he loves them . Sound quality brilliant , comfortable and look cool . He loves that there wireless bug have the cable to attach if needed charge quick too . Tempted to treat myself
customer_reviews.author: Tigger31

customer_reviews.title: A year later
customer_reviews.text: Nice headphones, over ear and pretty loud.......downside to this head phone is that after just about a year, only the right ear works in bluethooth mode but both ears works perfectly fine with the cable.....so now It's more like a regular wired headphones......
customer_reviews.author: Bisayo O.

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: A friend bought me these for xmas, I love them, the sound is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Very punky, great sound and fit very well for ne.
customer_reviews.text: whats not to like? great sound, very comfy fit over the ears (I have pierced ears, a scaffold bar in one ear and many stud's so finding over ear headphone that dont press down on my piercings isn't easy) They look rad and I love the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Raging Pixie

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones always love skull candy stuff great value great sound .
customer_reviews.author: mr s t hill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect all rounders. Smash the competition upto the £250 mark
customer_reviews.text: Best value skullcandys in my opinion. Great all round sound. Not so much bass it distorts but more than enough. Battey life os excellent. Best looking headphones of the entire range.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTING
customer_reviews.text: These are larger than I expected - bulky when I was looking for 'neat' as with previous Skullcandy headphones. But the real problem is the sound can only be described as lacking in detail and dull.
customer_reviews.author: prime buying choices

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. they are not the best at noise cancelling but they have great sound and the battery life is brilliant. they arrived 2 weeks ago and battery is at 50% and i use them quite often
customer_reviews.author: Robert Browne

customer_reviews.title: Partner Loves Them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my partners birthday as he was looking for a set of wireless headphones for the gym. He absolutely loves them. Comfortable fit, easy to use, great sound and a good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Iddles

customer_reviews.title: A very good product overall for me and I don`t regret buying them...
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair for almost a year and they are great value for money,the batteryes last ,very good on phones for music,movies or just to talk and if you plug them to a laptop with their wire the sound is boosted to dangerous levels for the ear but they still sound clearly.After some hours of continuous usage they become a bit uncomfortable but maybe that`s just me
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: OK for the money
customer_reviews.text: Slightly muddier than I remembered the bluetooth version being, but better than some more expensive one son the market, and better than buds.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: Marvellous value for money!
customer_reviews.text: Bang on for handling various types of musical styles from hard electronic to rock guitar music. The noise cancelling maybe just a little under my standards but it’s there. Very good value for money, these headphones really do perform well above their price tag.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good enough to buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Very very very good. I have been using it for 3 years I guess still working. I bought it in a discount so it values the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fab sounding headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great sound from these. So much so I bought these a second pair for my child. Awesome headphones
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Flashing LED let’s them down
customer_reviews.text: Great earphones and comfortable for long periods of time. Down side is the brightest blue flashing LED power light. Flashing every 2 seconds
customer_reviews.author: Simon Drillingcourt

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd pair I have had for my son in the last 12 months, they just don't last!!! The sound quality deteriorates after only a few months, the cord that is inserted into the actual headphones loosens and that's that...you'll have no option other than to send them back. Don't bother...spend a little more and get a pair of BOSE
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant quality would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones over a year ago and they still are working and in brilliant condition nothing has broken the sound quality is crisp I would definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: mis r k khabra

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of these. I use them in the gym and use them at home. Great product. They have a quality feel to them, great sound quality and look good. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very fast, efficient service. Great product that I bought for my 4yr old. He thinks they are great because of the graphics. I think they are great because they have good quality sound, are comfortable to wear, appropriate for children and I no longer have to listen to his DVDs on repeat in the car!
customer_reviews.author: Smoo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Covers all ear , soft and smooth. Sound is the highest quality. Perfect as a gift for your son or boyfriend
customer_reviews.author: Neda Liutkeviciute

customer_reviews.title: great looks and a higher grade sound than expected from skullcandys
customer_reviews.text: Overall i think these headphones are a bargain, you get two years warranty which covers any breakages by full RRP credit on their website, the styling is great and the construction is solid. The sound quality is brilliant for the 30 pounds paid, with the bass strong but not being muddy or taking away from the mids, treble. Only improvements could be made is a solid case not a flimsy pouch and possible a higher grade wire (removable so can get replaced easily). Also very comfortable. The seller is fulfilled by amazon and has genuine products which are delivered promptly. Had no reason to contact them.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Virtually indestructible
customer_reviews.text: Just awesome all round, battery life, sound quality and bulletproof
customer_reviews.author: Mark D Ross

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, great base, bluetooth is very useful, very comfortable, durable and charges fast. Great product from a great company, totally worth £60.
customer_reviews.author: mattxd

customer_reviews.title: A Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sounding Headphones. Unfortunately I sat on my Last pair and I'm glad I chose Skullcandy as I have always used this make, they're value for money, and always made to last. They sound Amazing, Especially as I listen to a varied selection of music.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for teenagers......
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter as she goes through headphones like there is no tomorrow! I had heard good reports about the quality and music quality of Skullcandy headphones and when I found out they come with a lifetime guarantee, that nailed the decision for me! Daddy and daughter very happy with the decision to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Chekov

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not that comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They're nice headphones but like another brands, the top of my head feels uncomfortable after wearing them for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Z. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant as always
customer_reviews.text: Brought these as a present and they went down a treat! I don't know much about the technical side but apparently they are absolutely brilliant. I k ow skull candy and a brilliant reputation and they didn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Such good ear phones. Easy to connect Bluetooth . Nice and light
customer_reviews.author: Natalie B.

product_meta.title: Skullcandy S6HBGY-374 Hesh 2.0 Over-Ear Bluetooth Wireless Headphone - Black/Gunmetal
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Black| Style Name:Hesh WirelessSkullcandy Hesh 2.0 Over-Ear Bluetooth Wireless Headphones with Volume Control - Black/Gunmetal.

BOX CONTAINS

- Skullcandy Hesh wireless headphones with mic
- Aux cable 
- Micro USB charge cable 
- Manual
feature_bullets: SUPREME SOUND: Hesh 2 Wireless features Supreme Sound technology, producing attacking, powerful bass, warm, natural vocals and precision highs.

ALL-DAY COMFORT, EVERYDAY STRENGTH: Soft synthetic leather ear cushions provide endless comfrot for your longest playlists. The flexible headband features a metal understructure that can withstand the punishment of everyday use.

LONG BATTERY LIFE: The rechargeable battery provides up to 15 hours of music when fully charged. Behind the left ear cup is a micro USB port for charging. An LED indicator will blink red when the battery is at 10%. Fully recharges in just 2.5 hours.

WIRELESS PAIRING AND CONTROL: Stream your music from any Bluetooth enabled devise. On-board plus and minus buttongs let you adjust volume and choose songs. Answer and place calls on hold with the round power button.
BACK-UP AUX CABLE: If you've transcended the need to sleep and your 15-hour battery needs charging, just plug in the included AUX cord with microphone and remote and never miss a beat.

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
